orbotix.sphero
Enum PersistentOptionFlags

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<PersistentOptionFlags>
      orbotix.sphero.PersistentOptionFlags
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<PersistentOptionFlags>
public enum PersistentOptionFlags
extends java.lang.Enum<PersistentOptionFlags>

Flags that persist over a Sphero sleep / wake cycle.

Enum Constant Summary
DefaultSettings
           
DisableSelfLevelInCharger
          Mask to to disable self-leveling when Sphero is inserted into the charger
EnableMotionTimeout
          Mask to enable motion timeouts
EnablePersistentTailLight
          Mask to force the tail LED always on
EnableVectorDrive
          Mask to enable Vector Drive, that is, when Sphero is stopped and a new roll command is issued
PreventSleepInCharger
          Mask to prevent Sphero from going to sleep when placed in the charger and connected over Bluetooth
